page.title: 16Maypole dancing
page.content: At St. John's school, Wetley Rocks we have Maypole Dancers. In April the headmaster brings the Maypole down from the Black & White House in Consall. He then goes round the top three classes and asks the girls if they would like to join in. They then have to practice twice a week before dancing at the garden party at the Black & White House. The Maypole has 16 ribbons, 4 of which are red, 4 green,4 blue and 4 yellow. We perform 6 dances, the Running Cross, Double Plait, Quad Plait,Barbers Pole and Barley Sugar Twist.
